projectDescription: A curated collection of configuration files for Neovim, Tmux, Alacritty, and AeroSpace window manager.
keyFeatures: LazyVim-based Neovim configuration with custom plugins
Tmux configuration with Catppuccin theme and Vim keybindings
Alacritty terminal with custom themes and transparency
AeroSpace window manager configuration for macOS
Integrated colorscheme support across all tools
publicApiSurface: nvim/lua/plugins/ - Plugin specifications (colorscheme, leetcode, obsidian, etc.)
tmux/tmux.conf - Tmux configuration with TPM plugin manager
